name: Pang Sua Pond

reviews.text: Nice place to have a stroll. The rain water collected in this pond will be pumped to Upper Seletar Reservoir eventually. Please keep our waters clean, do not throw anything into the pond.

Fun fact
üí¢Pang Sua means "weighing sand"
in Hokkien dialect.
The name is derived from the practice of weighing sand in the area in the past (early 1900s).
Local enforcement authority would escort lorries suspected of over carrying sands to Pang Sua for weighing to acertain it's stipulated carrying weight.
üí¢Another explanation is that Pang Sua may means "release sand".
The over-carrying sand lorries were escorted to Pang Sua to release the excess sand.
